statements: SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards
SELECT ranking, player_name FROM leaderboards ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_name, ranking FROM leaderboards WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM leaderboards ORDER BY ranking ASC
SELECT player_name, score, ranking FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT player_id, player_name, score, ranking FROM leaderboards ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, ranking FROM leaderboards WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, score, ranking FROM leaderboards WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 10 ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, ranking FROM leaderboards WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT player_name, score FROM leaderboards WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, rank_position FROM PlayerScores JOIN Rankings ON PlayerScores.player_id = Rankings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, rank_position FROM PlayerScores INNER JOIN Rankings ON PlayerScores.player_id = Rankings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerScores WHERE score >= 100 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT player_name, score, rank_position FROM PlayerScores INNER JOIN Rankings ON PlayerScores.player_id = Rankings.player_id ORDER BY rank_position;
SELECT * FROM player_scores;
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_rankings WHERE rank > 3;
SELECT player_id, rank, score FROM leaderboard WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, score, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY rank;
SELECT player_id, score FROM player_scores WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT player_id, rank FROM player_rankings WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank ASC
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE score between 50 and 100 AND rank > 5 ORDER BY rank ASC, score DESC
SELECT player_id, score, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE rank < 5 OR score > 200 ORDER BY rank ASC, score DESC
SELECT player_id, rank, score FROM player_rankings PR JOIN leaderboard LB ON PR.player_id = LB.player_id WHERE PR.rank < 5 ORDER BY PR.rank DESC, LB.score ASC
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, score FROM scores ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, overall_rank FROM rankings WHERE overall_rank <= 100;
SELECT leaderboard_name, player_name FROM leaderboards l JOIN rankings r ON l.ranking_id = r.ranking_id JOIN players p ON r.player_id = p.player_id;
SELECT player_name, player_email FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id;
SELECT player_name, overall_rank FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id;
SELECT player_name, leaderboard_name FROM players JOIN rankings ON players.player_id = rankings.player_id JOIN leaderboards ON rankings.ranking_id = leaderboards.ranking_id;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players JOIN scores ON players.player_id = scores.player_id WHERE score > 1000;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT player_name FROM players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM players JOIN player_scores ON players.player_id = player_scores.player_id WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_id, game_name, player_score FROM player_games JOIN games ON player_games.game_id = games.game_id WHERE player_score > 500;
SELECT player_id, player_name, ranking FROM players JOIN player_rankings ON players.player_id = player_rankings.player_id WHERE ranking < 10;
